name: Treasure of Fates
description:
Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • [SPACE] - Skipping everything that seems skippable

  • F - Fullscreen

Goal

You can't only go deeper into the ocean. Your goal is to get all the treasures on every level. The radar in the bottom-right corner shows how many treasures are left on every level.

Story

In another mundane mission your submarine got hit very hard, causing a malfunction. Because of the pressure level it can't get to the surface. The crew start panicking, but you, the Captain comes with a great idea. There are treasures hidden deep in the ocean. By getting them all you will be saved from eternal doom. So you and your crew put your lives on this mission.

The only way to get out is to go deeper

Warning

After playing some time the game starts getting slow (accumulates trash in the heap). Restarting the game will help.
